software_engineer.text: Tell me about a time you solved a difficult bug.
Design a URL shortener. What components would you use and why?
Explain the difference between process and thread.

sales.text: Tell me about a time you overcame an objection from a customer.
How do you handle leading a demo for a skeptical prospect?
Describe a time when you exceeded a sales target.

retail.text: How would you handle a customer complaining loudly about a product?
Tell me about a time you worked as part of a team to meet a deadline.
How would you upsell a product to a budget-conscious customer?
